code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        q <= d; // Assign d to q on the positive edge of clk
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]
